name: North Country Rover (4 in 8 days)
description:
NORTH COUNTRY ROVER Unlimited travel with weekday time restrictions for any 4 days in 8 days. It extends from Carlisle and Newcastle in the north to Preston, Leeds and Hull in the south and from Heysham and Morecambe in the west to Whitby and Scarborough in the east 
      and includes the Settle & Carlisle line, the Cumbrian Coast line between Carlisle and Barrow-in-Furness, the Tyne Valley line between Carlisle and Newcastle and the Yorkshire Wolds Coast 
      line between Hull and Scarborough. The North Country Rover is now available to buy online

fares_and_restrictions.raw: fares & restrictions New fares from 2nd Mar 2025 Any 4 days in 8 adult: £126.10 child (5-15): £63.05 16-17 saver: £63.05 railcards ⯆ 16 26 SE DI 2T FF H V : £83.95 FF H V child fare: £23.95 Railcards ⯈ Railcards: 16 = 16-25 26 = 26-30 SE = Senior DI = Disabled 2T = Two Together FF = Family & Friends H = HM Forces V = Veterans Previous fares ⯈ Previous fares (adult): 2024 - £120.60 2023 - £114.90 2022 - £108.50 2021 - £101.90 2020 - £101.90 2019 - £99.10 2018 - £96.00 2014 - £88.00 2011 - £76.00 time restrictions Mon to Fri: valid from 09:00 but valid anytime between Carlisle and Barrow in Furness. 2T railcard not valid until 09:30 No restrictions at weekends or bank holidays route restrictions Not valid on Grand Central or Hull Trains train operating companies Avanti West Coast, CrossCountry, London North Eastern Railway, Northern, TransPennine Express purchasing ONLINE : ✔ Train conductor: ✔ * Station ticket office: ✔ Ticket Vending Machine: i Northern Ticket Vending Machines now sell most ranger and rover tickets but at the moment only for same-day travel (rather prohibitive for distant areas) Some Avanti West Coast station TVMs for example Crewe, now sell local rangers and rovers. LNER TVMs at Doncaster, Edinburgh, London King's Cross, Newcastle and York also sell them. A number of PTE areas sell local rangers from TVMs in their area e.g. South Yorkshire, Strathclyde and West Midlands * valid ticket to travel is required unless boarded at a station without ticket-issuing facilities

stations: Hutton Cranswick Ilkley James Cook University Hospital Keighley
